documents.document: “Some #training days u don't feel like u have it, but u still do it, which means u got it.” via @ncjack
In dreams and in #love there are no impossibilities. -Janos Arany
In every walk with nature one receives far more than he seeks. ~ John Muir ---> experience your #run
“Kind words can be short and easy to speak, but their echoes are truly endless.” ― Mother Teresa via @CharityIdeas
#Courage is the discovery that you may not win, and trying when you know you can lose.~ Tom Krause
I hope that I may always desire more than I can accomplish. Michelangelo #determination
I am fine but am in search for the Doctor who has a solution other than 'Don't run for 60 days' ~ Macon on getting injured” via @RunToWin
I hope to die in the saddle seat. ~Albert Ellis #run #live
Love recognizes no barriers. It jumps hurdles, leaps fences, penetrates walls to arrive at it destination full of hope. Maya Angelou #run
“The race is not always to the swift... but to those who keep on #running” via @TheTrailJogger
Your #fears are not walls, but hurdles. - Millman
"One mile at a time" #run
Each of us has a fire in our hearts for something. It's our goal in life to find it #reach #change #passion
"Some #hearts do not need speed training, they were just simply made to give life everything" RQ
I will #persist without exception. ~Andy Andrews via @chrisvoss
To #live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist, that’s all.~Oscar Wilde
"#Dreamers are not people disconnected from reality. Dreamers are people fully connected to reality's potential.” via @AffirmationSpot
"If everything seems under control, you're just not going fast enough." ~ Mario Andretti #run
"My 1st thought on my birthday 'One more year until I move into another age group!' I guess I'm a #runner." -- Karen Austin via @RunToWin
Without #ambition one starts nothing. Without work one finishes nothing. via @Kcancer
People ask, "But what if #positive thinking doesn't work?" Better to ask, "What if negative thinking does?" via @AffirmationSpot
Never stop dreaming, ever
"You were never created to reach a certain level and then plateau. You were created to #excel.” via @coacheye
#Thankful for our amazing followers! Thanks for sharing your running inspirations
#Thankful for my running friends who think what we all do is perfectly normal
#Thankful for the freedom to run
I don't have a regimented training plan. I run entirely how I feel. -- Gary Allen via @RunToWin
"You can either live or watch other people do it for you" RQ #your #choice
"True friends are special gifts. Take care of them, listen to them, thank them, and never forget to be a #friend back" unknown
"Nothing will ever be attempted if all #possible objections must first be overcome." - Samuel Johnson
Keep digging deeper.. you will find what you #passionately pursue for! via @Kcancer
"A single act of courage is often the tipping point for something extraordinary." via @AnnTran_ #start #run #finish
"Anyone can run 20 miles. It's the next six that count." - Barry Magee #running #marathon
#change #life #live #dream #goforit
“Mentoring is your true legacy. It is the greatest inheritance you can give to others. To teach and be taught.”John Wooden, #coaching
It is a bad plan that allows no room for #modification - Publius Syrus via @TheTrailJogger
Give me strength, reserve control Give me heart and give me soul ~ Coldplay #marathon #Ironman #ultra
Maybe the streets alight, maybe the trees are gone..I feel my heart start beating to my favourite song ~Coldplay #run #feel
"Do not be afraid of death. Be afraid of the half-lived life!" - Laird Hamilton #live
"Never settle, set your sights high. If you aim your #goals too low, you might just hit them.” via @TheNoteboook
The question isn't who's going to let me; the question is who's going to #stop me. ♥ Ayn Rand
There are a million open doors to opportunity and no waiting. When you do what others won't, the lines are shorter.” via @AffirmationSpot
“If good things come to those who wait, then I must have something ridiculously #amazing coming!” via @TheNoteboook
Everyone is a #runner. Some just haven't figured it out.” via @BartYasso
"Love what you do. Do what you love." - Wayne Dyer #passion #run #love #makedifference
"Laziness is nothing more than the habit of resting before you get tired." Jules Renard via @ninagarcia #train #run
Think you won’t make a difference with one run? You wont make any difference doing nothing via @running_junkie #run
"Life is either a daring adventure or nothing." Helen Keller #live
When the road ahead seems too long, look back to see how far you’ve come. #triathlon #progress via @zumadog
Life is more fun with other #runners via @JeffGalloway
"Confidence is contagious. So is lack of #confidence." -Vincent T Lombardi
"If we do not take advantage of our #opportunities, it is our own fault." -- Thomas J. Watson via @RunToWin
Embrace the souls that dare to reach out a hand in kindness ~ unknown #quote
#Running helps me believe I can
"open doors let life pleasures in, closed doors do not" unknown #life #risks #run
All #marathons are 26 miles 385 yards. Anything longer & race is ultramarathon. Anything less & course was mismeasured~via @higdonmarathon
Never give up on something that you can't go a day without thinking about. via @DrAndyBaldwin #life #love #run
"Every step you take brings you closer to the #finish line.” via @higdonmarathon
You will do this! #run #marathon #ironman
Pain is the sensation that reminds you that you are still #alive - R Marchenko via @TheTrailJogger
"My philosophy on #running is, I don't dwell on it, I do it." Joan Benoit Samuelson
Those who say that I will lose and am finished will have to #run over my body to beat me.~Said Aouita
“Love the life you live. Live the life you love." - Bob Marley #run
Go the extra mile. It's never crowded. ~Author Unknown #giveback via @LJ3000
Your #possibilities are absolutely endless. via @AffirmationSpot
“You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.” via @Kcancer
Sometimes the biggest accomplishment is not who finishes first, but who #finishes last!
I #run on purpose
It's a little like wrestling a gorilla. You don't quit when you're tired you quit when the gorilla is tired ~Strauss via @Malibumarathon
Most people just exist. Go #live! via @DrAndyBaldwin
“Limitations live only in our minds. But if we use our #imaginations, our possibilities become limitless.” Paolinetti
I'm not running this #race to win, but to give it everything I got
"To settle is a choice, you can choose to #run after your dreams”
No matter our age or condition, there are still untapped #possibilities within us & new beauty waiting to be born ~Turner
You can't feel the finish line, if you don't start #run
Don't just race for time, race for the love of the race, the people you meet along the way, and the strangers & friends you #inspire
"None are so old as those who lose their #enthusiasm." ~Henry David Thoreau
Endurance? You’ve only got to get out there and do it. Face up to it: man was meant to #run – Percy Cerutty
"if you give, you begin to live." — Dave Matthews Band #charity #runners
“Take what you can from your dreams, make them as real as anything.” Dave Matthews Band #choose #life #love #run
The world only gets better, if people risk something to make it better via @Kcancer #charity #runners
In 2005 I thought that completing an ironman was impossible. I said 'you must be crazy' to do them. Now look at me ~ @chrissiesmiles
"Go after your #dream, no matter how unattainable others think it is." -Linda Mastandrea via @ESPNW
Chemistry can come in many forms #friends #love #passion #runningpartners
"The day came when the #risk to remain tight in a bud was more painful than the risk it took to blossom." ~ Anais Nin via @charityideas
"Do something wonderful, people may imitate it." ~ Albert Schweitzer #quote via @charityideas
“You cant get much done in life if you only work on the days when you feel good.” ~Jerry West #running #quotes via @running_junkie
"Did you know that running uphill, at race pace; will strengthen your legs better than any weight training you could do?" via @JeffGalloway
To go fast, go alone; to go far, go together. -Warren Buffett via @CharityIdeas #run #endure
The big secret in #life is that there is no big secret. Whatever ur #goal, u can get there if u’re willing to work. -Oprah
"Coach said we do what's hard, to make us hard, which makes us hard to beat.” via @gosonja #run
"Choose to persist without exception." - Andy Andrews #run #distance
I've grown certain that the root of all #fear is that we've been forced to deny who we are. ~Frances Moore Lappe via @iheartquotes
Belief is a dream's accelerator and doubt its speed limit. #run #believe (via @AffirmationSpot)
"We are designed to #run - and we increase our chance of daily #happiness when we do so." via @jeffgalloway
"You have to believe in yourself when no one else does; that makes you a winner right there." -- Venus Williams
“You will never succeed beyond your wildest #dreams unless you are willing to have some wild dreams.”
#Passion is energy. Passion is desire. Passion makes you smiles when nobody is watching.
The more I #practice, the luckier I get. -Jerry Barber
Don't Settle.... So keep looking until you find it. Don’t settle.” Steve Jobs #inspiration
